title: Bug 2120 - MRU File List is not persisted between sessions
description: The MRU (Most Recently Used) file list in the File menu does not retain its contents between sessions.
OB: The files that were previously opened and appeared in the MRU list no longer appear when launching the application again.
EB: The files that were previously opened should still be displayed in the MRU list when launching the application again.
SR:
1. Launch the application.
2. Open a few files.
3. Close the application.
4. Launch the application again.
5. Check the File menu for the MRU list and verify if the previously opened files are still displayed.
